title: A Beginner's Guide to Blue Aventurine

steps.title: Blue aventurine is associated with mental clarity, self-discipline, and personal growth.
steps.content: Blue aventurine is associated with mental clarity, self-discipline, and personal growth. This powerful stone is a member of the quartz family. steps.title: Blue aventurine has been used for hundreds of years.
steps.content: Blue aventurine has been used for hundreds of years. It decorated statues in ancient Tibet, and it was used in jewelry made by indigenous people in Brazil. [3] X Research source Blue aventurine got its modern name in the 1800’s from the Italian phrase “a ventura,” which means “by chance.” [4] X Research source This name actually comes from the accidental creation of goldstone, a sparkly glass material that looks similar to blue aventurine. [5] X Research source Deposits of blue aventurine exist in Brazil, India, China, Russia, Tibet, and Nepal. [6] X Research source
